extraction_notes: Example extraction demonstrating Phase 3 v5.0 methodology with molecular LEGOs
seeds: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

seeds.molecular_rationale: Multi-word unit expressing conditional desire. Cannot be broken down further while maintaining FD mapping.
seeds.notes: Conditional form of 'gustar' combined with indirect object pronoun. Common in polite requests.
Modal verb expressing ability/possibility. Frequently used with infinitives.

seeds.fd_test: KNOWN: 'after you finish' → TARGET: 'después de que termines' (deterministic)
seeds.molecular_rationale: CRITICAL: 'después de que' alone fails FD test (grammatically incomplete, requires verb clause). Must include conjugated verb to form complete FD unit.
seeds.structure_explanation: Temporal conjunction 'después de que' + subjunctive verb. The subjunctive is required after this conjunction when referring to future/uncertain actions.
seeds.notes: This demonstrates the molecular LEGO principle: the entire phrase is indivisible for FD purposes.

P04.description: Expressing conditional desires or polite requests
P04.grammatical_notes: Uses conditional form of gustar (to please) with indirect object pronoun
examples: Me gustaría poder (I'd like to be able to)
Me gustaría hablar (I'd like to speak)
Me gustaría saber (I'd like to know)
P04.teaching_notes: Emphasize the conditional aspect and polite register

P10.description: Expressing temporal relationships with future/uncertain actions
P10.grammatical_notes: Temporal conjunction requiring subjunctive mood when action is future or uncertain
examples: después de que termines (after you finish)
después de que llegues (after you arrive)
después de que comas (after you eat)
P10.teaching_notes: Key subjunctive trigger. Emphasize that 'después de que' alone is grammatically incomplete.

learnings: Molecular LEGO principle: 'después de que' cannot stand alone grammatically
FD test prevents incomplete constructions from being isolated as LEGOs
All molecular LEGOs must include componentization showing internal structure
Pattern instances marked at LEGO level, summarized at course level

seed_pair.note: L03 and L04 were separate: 'después de que' (C) and 'después de que termines' (C)

issues: 'después de que' as standalone LEGO violates FD principle

seed_pair.note: L04 is complete molecular LEGO: 'después de que termines'

benefits: FD test ensures complete, usable LEGOs
Pattern collections track usage across seeds
Known Language First ensures learner-friendly mapping
